# Boiling City Via Instagram

This is prof of concept in how to consume realtime data from Instagram.
## Demo
Thanks to [heroku.com](heroku.com) I managed to deploy it at [http://boiling-city-instagram.herokuapp.com](http://boiling-city-instagram.herokuapp.com)
## How it works?
The application is reading the configuration variables from /server/config.js
Based on _cityCoverage, tagSubscription _ it creates subscriptions for media. 
When a new photo is uploaded the instagram posts to the application the media information and the app will push the media to browsers that are connected via sockets.

## How to configure?
* Open file /server/config.js
* Add your domain to the variable _domainName_
* Add your Instagram _clientId_ and _clientSecret_ to the _instagramConfig_ object. (reference: [Instagram Developer API](http://instagram.com/developer/)

## How to run it?
`node app.js`

## For developers:
* It creates subscription automatically when the first socket.io receives a new connection.
* It unsubscribes automatically when there is no one connected via socket.io
* It creates a cache from the first images that were search based on the _tagSubsciption_ array and it will update that array every-time a new media was pushed to the browser.
